body.name: 2Pack Light Bulb Security Camera Outdoor,2.4G Wifi Light Socket Security Cameras 1080P,Security Wireless Security Camera Outdoor/Indoor,Color Night Vision,Twoway Dialogue,Motion Tracking,Cloud Storage
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 7 hrs 48 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 33 mins
features: 📷【Easy installation and remote control】 – With simple instructions and an easy-to-follow installation process, you can set up your camera in minutes, no need for professional installation. You can also easily control and access the camera remotely through our user-friendly app.

📷【Motion detection real-time alarm】 – Our advanced technology ensures real-time motion detection, alerting you to any suspicious activity the moment it happens. You can customize the sensitivity to ensure you don't receive false alerts from non-significant motions.

📷【Color night vision device / two-way dialogue】 – Our state-of-the-art camera features a color night vision device with a 1080P high definition lens, providing a crystal-clear image even in low light conditions. You also have the option to communicate with people at your front door or in your room via a built-in speaker and microphone.

📷【1080P and cloud storage】 – Our camera's high-resolution 1080P video recording capabilities ensure that you won't miss any important details. With cloud storage, you can store recordings securely for easy viewing later.

📷【24/7 recording and After-sales service】 – Our product boasts 24/7 continuous recording, ensuring that you have a record of every moment, allowing you to check your home's security at any time, from anywhere. We will provide you with a dedicated after-sales team customer service for free. You can find us to solve any problems about the camera. If you are not satisfied with our products, we will 100% return and refund for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WiFi Light Bulb Security Camera,your best home guard. Output power: 5W Pixel: 1080P/2 million Communication method: 2.4G wifi/wireless Viewing angle: 355° (horizontal)/95° (vertical) Power supply (V): AC110V-240V, output DC12V Storage: up to 128G SD card Audio: Two-way audio Motion detection: support Alert Notification: Support Night vision function: infrared + full color night vision Supported mobile systems: Android/IOS

24/7 Local Storage Recording & Remote Playback,Support Max128g Sd Card & Cloud Storage Our light bulb camera supports 24/7 video recording, and the light bulb camera supports a maximum of 128G memory card (not included), and we can also use our cloud storage customization service (fee required).

Smart Motion Tracking & Smart Notifications Our advanced technology ensures real-time motion detection, alerting you to any suspicious activity the moment it happens,You can receive a warning message on the APP

Two-Way Audio,Vou Can Talk From A Distance Through The Camera When you are not at home, you can choose to communicate with visiting guests, couriers or family members indoors through the built-in speaker and microphone.

1080p Full Hd Panorama,You Can Switch Between Blackand White And Color Night Vision At Will, And It Is As Clear As Day Even At Night The security light bulb with camera is equipped with 4 IR LEDs and 4 white LEDs, which can capture 1080P HD images within 33 feet. Night vision mode supports IR-CUT automatic switching, normal night vision, and color night vision, free to choose and camera light bulb adds anti-flicker and 3D-DNR. Record HD video even at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t think it would be this great
reviews.reviewText: In the beginning I was skeptical but after installing the 2 cams I was impressed with the quality and the value.Pros: easy to install, high quality recording, motion tracking feature, 360 recordingCons: you need continuous source of power through the outlet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive. Easy to set up.
reviews.reviewText: This product was shipped fast and the instructions were clear. Setup was easy, less than 5 minutes to setup 2 cameras. The quality seems to be real good and the appearance is what you'd expect. The motion sensor seems to work well and the quality of the image is good. I'd recommend this to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Did what it needed to do
reviews.reviewText: It served the purpose for a while, but I wouldn't consider it an outdoor camera unless it's under a canopy or cover. The cameras lights started going out and would not stay in the default position when it was initially set up. I have a pair and may just mount the other camera somewhere inside the house facing outside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We really like these cameras. I didn't know that the picture quality would be so good and the two way speaker is pretty great for us. Wife asked for the app immediately. Also had a question for customer service and they don't disappoint! Very prompt and helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 1 works absolutely awesome and 1 doesn't.
reviews.reviewText: So I bought a two pack one works fabulously and one doesn't I went in and asked on their Facebook page if there were some support issues I could attend to and I have have received nothing from them. Although one works absolutely flawlessly I'm not sure that I would buy more because of their lack of support

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don’t have to have a cloud service to access my recordings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will not hook up to my wifi
reviews.reviewText: I have to send these back after spending hours trying to figure out how to configure these. It needs a 2.4 ghz signal and mine has a 5. I tried everything I read online… I moved away from the house. I tried an old device, and nothing worked. Frustrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ¡La solución completa para la vigilancia en el hogar!
reviews.reviewText: Estas cámaras exteriores 1080P son perfectas. La instalación fue rápida y la calidad de imagen, impresionante. La visión nocturna a color es un plus genial. Su seguimiento de movimiento es preciso y el diálogo bidireccional funciona a la perfección. El almacenamiento en la nube es la cereza del pastel. ¡Súper recomendadas para una seguridad completa y fácil!
